featured.text: To have a full discussion of the issue, the committee spent a whole hour _____ their ideas at the meeting.
Everyone in the office must attend the meeting tomorrow.
the weather, the athletic meetings will be held on time.
Around an old kitchen table, a young girl calls a family meeting to show her parents that they should earn more money so they can have nicer things.
Steve has several meetings to attend every day; therefore, he has to work on a very _____ schedule.

other.text: Jack’s invitation to the party because it conflicted with an important business meeting.
But the young man who had made a fool of himself at the meeting was not on the list.
The chairperson of the meeting asked everyone to speak up instead of _____
He was late for the meeting the heavy rain.
If a member country suffers great damage from a certain typhoon, it can 39 that the name of the typhoon be deleted from the list at the annual committee meeting.

definition.en_def: A gathering of people for a specific purpose, often to discuss or decide on matters.
definition.example: We have a meeting scheduled for tomorrow to discuss the project updates.
